item.title: Emoji in Actions during this 2020 Awkwardness
item.author: contact@khal.web.id (Khalid Adisendjaja)
item.description: These days, a lot of conversations happen and people have many ways to express their feeling whether it’s sad, angry, happy, or even desperation. Emoji is one thing that you could never miss its sighting. In fact, the way that people use emojis could be related to our current circumstances. At this time being, it canâ€™t be denied this is the year of the health-related emoji.
